div.p: SAD NEWS, WE LOST A GREAT ONE TODAY.
GILL CATES WHO WAS THE PRODUCER THAT WE WORKED WITH ON THE OSCARS FOR BOTH TIMES.
JUST AN ABSOLUTELY IN LAYMAN'S TERMS A MENCH AND COULDN'T HAVE
HAD A BETTER TIME WORKING WITH HIM.
YOU KNOW YOU WERE IN SHOW BUSINESS WHEN YOU SAT IN GILL CATES' OFFICE AND YOU JUST SAT
THERE AND ATE JELLY BEANS AND LET HIM TELL YOU STORIES ABOUT CAREY GRANT AND NICHOLSON AND
ALL THE GREATS HE'D WORKED WITH AND IT WAS A PLEASURE.
WE'RE GOING TO MISS HIM A LOT.
HERE IT IS, YOUR MOMENT OF ZEN.
>> THERE'S VERY FEW LEFT ON TELEVISION, THIS IS THE BIGGEST ONE.
